https://github.com/rstudio/reticulate/pull/107

> No support for sharing objects between R and Python sessions in notebooks. Only `knitr` compilation.

```{r}
knitr::knit_engines$set(python = reticulate::eng_python)
```

```{r}
library(reticulate)
```


```{python}
x = 99
print(x)
```

```{python}
print(x)
```
